snippet.title: Teaser "Super Saurio Fly"
snippet.description:
GET SUPER SAURIO FLY ON STEAM: http://store.steampowered.com/app/818060/Super_Saurio_Fly/

CONSIGUE SUPER SAURIO FLY EN STEAM:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/818060/Super_Saurio_Fly/

FRAXEL GAMES: www.fraxelgames.es

“Super Saurio Fly” is a 2D arcade platformer and adventure videogame developed on “Unity 3D” by Fraxel Games. Players will move along the stages  crossing different parts of the world by using Super Saurio´s ability to fly, dodge traps and defeat other dinosaurs.

“Super Saurio Fly” is comprised of sixteen levels and five different worlds, with two difficulty modes giving the player a lot of hours to play and have fun.

The storyline puts the player on the role of Saurio, a cute and clumsy tiny pterodactyl whose eggs were stolen. Saurio will have to look for his eggs around the world and defeat the evil kidnappers .



"Super Saurio Fly" es un arcade plataforma y videojuego de aventura en 2D desarrollado en Unity por Fraxel Games. Los jugadores avanzarán a través de diferentes mundos gracias a las habilidades especiales de Saurio, derrotando a otros dinosaurios.

"Super Saurio Fly" consta de 16 niveles and cinco diferentes mundos, con dos niveles de dificultad, dando al jugador horas de juego y diversión.

La historia introduce al jugador en la piel de Saurio, un dulce y torpe ptoradáctilo a quien han robado sus huevos. Saurio tendrá que ir en busca de sus hijos alrededor del mundo para derrotar a los malvados captores.
